snippet: An ethics panel made the request after a lawyer for the Campaign for One New York indicated that it would no longer cooperate with an investigation.
abstract: New York State Joint Commission on Public Ethics asks court to compel nonprofit Campaign for One New York to heed subpoena of documents related to its lobbying and fund-raising activities.
lead_paragraph: An ethics panel made the request after a lawyer for the Campaign for One New York indicated that it would no longer cooperate with an investigation.

headline.main: Court Is Asked to Compel de Blasio Nonprofit to Heed Subpoena
headline.print_headline: Ethics Panel Wants Judge to Enforce Its Subpoena Against Group Allied With Mayor
